info.title: hrddsdemo
info.description:
Web service that demonstrates an API for the HRDDS POC.

# Environments

| API Version | Key Type | WSO2 URL | Environment |
| ----------- | -------- | -------- | ----------- |
| v1 | Sandbox | https://api.byu.edu:443/domains/hrddsdemo/v1 | Development |

# Provisioning System Access

This API is controlled by the authorization measures defined in the PeopleSoft HR environment.

# Authentication

Applications must be subscribed to the hrddsdemo API in WSO2 and use the application bearer token in all requests.

<SecurityDefinitions />
